personal_info.name: Bony Thomas
personal_info.title: Founder & CEO of PayNback
personal_info.tagline: Empowering Local Retail Through Technology | B2B2C Community Commerce Network

summary: Founder & CEO of PayNback, an AI-driven in-store rewards and customer engagement platform built to scale across India's massive offline retail market. Leading the development of a B2B2C commerce ecosystem that connects small retailers, MSMEs, and local shoppers through instant digital rewards, actionable data insights, and hyperlocal engagement. Championing PayNback's mission to digitize and empower neighbourhood commerce—beginning in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities that drive nearly 70% of India's retail economy. Focused on accelerating merchant growth, increasing repeat footfall, and enabling micro-retailers to compete effectively with organized retail and e-commerce.

experience.description: Leading PayNback's mission to digitize neighbourhood commerce with AI-driven rewards platform. Overseeing product innovation, fundraising, merchant acquisition, compliance, and strategic partnerships. Targeting 5 lakh merchants and 5 crore users over 7-year roadmap.
Business development and market analysis for retail operations.

experience.role: Project Development Manager & Business Development Specialist
experience.description: Managing project development initiatives and business expansion strategies across multiple markets.
Led import-export development projects and international trade operations.
Specialized in investment analysis and portfolio management.
Managed large-scale business development projects across Middle East markets.

projects.name: PayNback Platform
projects.description: AI-driven in-store rewards and customer engagement platform connecting small retailers, MSMEs, and local shoppers. Features include instant digital rewards, actionable data insights, and hyperlocal engagement tools.
projects.impact: Targeting 5 lakh merchants and 5 crore users across India's Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities

vision: Building a Made-in-India, investment-ready platform to become India's most trusted community commerce network—strengthening local economies, supporting grassroots retailers, and fueling inclusive digital growth.
